headline: CMS Energy announces cash tender offers for up to $125 million of outstanding debt securities issued by Consumers Energy
summary: CMS Energy Corporation ("CMS Energy") (NYSE: CMS) announced today the commencement of a cash tender offer (the "Tender Offer") for up to $125 million aggregate principal amount (the "Aggregate Tender Cap") of the outstanding bonds listed in the table below (the "Bonds"), which were issued by Consumers Energy Company ("Consumers").

content.title: CMS Energy announces cash tender offers for up to $125 million of outstanding debt securities issued by Consumers Energy
content.summary: CMS Energy Corporation ("CMS Energy") (NYSE: CMS) announced today the commencement of a cash tender offer (the "Tender Offer") for up to $125 million aggregate principal amount (the "Aggregate Tender Cap") of the outstanding bonds listed in the table below (the "Bonds"), which were issued by Consumers Energy Company ("Consumers").
